alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 2:11PM CST until February 10 at 11:44AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occurs between Shady Point and Arkoma. Williams Road east of Panama and some local farm roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and crest near 33.1 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
